metadata.title: CVE-2024-35366 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg n6.1.1 is Integer Overflow. The vulnerability exists in theparse_options function of sbgdec.c within the libavformat module. Whenparsing certain options, the software does not adequately validate theinput. This allows for negative duration values to be accepted withoutproper bounds checking.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
